title: Bake Sale
description: Billy's bike is broken! What will Billy do to solve his problem? In Bake Sale, students will learn about problems and solutions through an adorable story about friends helping each other. This book can also be used to teach students how to retell and to use quotation marks correctly.
meta: bake sale, broken, fixed, tarts, treats, upset
Problem and Solution : Determine problem and solution
Long Vowel Sounds : Discriminate long vowel /a/ sound
Quotation Marks : Recognize and use quotation marks
Alphabetical Order : Place words in alphabetical order

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
